Letter to the Editor, May 28, 2012, New York, NY USA From Bob Wilson http://www.garyrevel.com/news/BobWilsonLettertoEditor.htmThe last U. S. Government "official" investigation of the murders of JFK and MLK by the House Select Committee on Assassinations (HSCA) found a probable conspiracy in their deaths. The recommendation of the committee was to have the Dept. of Justice pick up the trial. Their only official undercover investigator, Special Investigator Gary Revel, over the years has continued to bring attention to the facts of the cases and followed up the links he found to the assassination of Robert F. Kennedy. He further found that, like Oswald was a patsy in the JFK assassination and James Earl Ray was a patsy in the MLK assassination, Sirhan Sirhan was also a patsy and not guilty of the murder of RFK. . THU, 28 MAY 2012 16:15:00 CSThttp://www.garyrevel.com/NEWS -
Conspired to Kill an opinion and commentary by Gary Revel http://www.garyrevel.com/news/conspiredtokill.htmlAll the major news organizations in the United States and beyond helped in establishing the lone gunman theory and a cover-up of the conspiracy. One of the methods used by them was to paint anyone who didn't go along with the lie that a lone gunman was the killer as some kind of half witted conspiracy theorist. Many of the major magazine and book publishers worked together with the conspirators and their chosen authors/journalists to publish works that were simply propaganda and used to convince sensible people that anything but the lone gunman scenario was wayward thinking even possibly lunacy. It is sad to say that the operations worked very well because in spite of the facts continuing to make the case that the killings could not have been lone gunman operations many people are still convinced of the lies published and still being promoted by the conspirators' comrades and supporters. SAT, 26 MAY 2012 14:15:00 CSThttp://www.garyrevel.com/NEWS -
Historical Perspective and Commentary by Gary Revel http://www.garyrevel.com/news/perspective1.htmlAs I stand on the edge of time that seems to be an arrival of great change and life meaning such as hinted at in times before but not remarkably realized as yet, I am humbled. My love for America will not die with me. My love for my fellow human being, where-ever and whoever they may be, will never fail regardless of the beat or non-beat of my heart. My love for the beauty and sometimes coarseness of words shall not pass away as they enlighten, encourage, bolster and sometimes discipline our lives. The sound of music, like the stars that shine in the night sky, could only diminish but for the comfort, warmth and brightness of the orchestrations in heaven itself. SAT, 26 MAY 2012 14:00:00 CSThttp://www.garyrevel.com/NEWS -

Wesley Snipes to do MLK movie based on Code Name Zorro http://www.cinemablend.com/new/Wesley-Snipes-Planning-A-Film-About-J-Edgar-Hoover-And-Martin-Luther-King-Jr-21340.html Lately Wesley Snipes is better known as a punchline on NBC sitcoms than for any of his own work-- both 30 Rock and Community have taken gentle jabs in recent episodes at the actor, who is currently battling the IRS thanks a big pile of unpaid taxes. He's still due to serve a three-year prison sentence for that crime, but he's also got big plans to produce and star in films-- including, as explained to Deadline, a feature about J. Edgar Hoover's smear campaign against Martin Luther King Jr. Yes, you're reading that right. Even as Clint Eastwood is developing his own biopic about the former FBI chief, Snipes wants to tackle a different side of Hoover's long and storied career, his efforts to tarnish King's reputation through wiretapping and trying to ruin his marriage. There's plenty of documentation about the effort. COINTELPRO was exposed in a book called "Code Name Zorro". After MLK's "I Have A Dream Speech," the FBI'S COINTEL director William Sullivan wrote to Hoover that "We must mark [King] now, if we have not done so before, as the most dangerous Negro of the future in this nation." Sullivan eventually tried to blow the whistle on the project, but was shot and killed in a so-called "hunting accident" before his book about Hoover could be published. Snipes is producing under his Maandi Media Productions banner and hopes to play a role of some kind in the Justin Stamm-scripted project, entitled Code Name Zorro based on the book Co-authored by Mark Lane and Dick Gregory. Tue, 26 Oct 2010 12:00:00 PST http://www.garyreve.com/ -
